document.full_text: he number of civilians and soldiers killed in iraqi violence fell in april, official figures showed on sunday, although attacks continued against security forces ahead of the withdrawal of u.s. troops.
document.title: iraqi violent deaths, but injuries drop in april
lines_and_colors: he number of civilians and soldiers killed in iraqi violence fell in april, official figures showed on sunday, although attacks continued against security forces ahead of the withdrawal of u.s. troops.
